revised_title: Spin Effects in Helium Atoms: A New Approach to Perturbation Theory
tldr: The authors present a new approach to perturbation theory, focusing on spin effects in helium atoms. They use Dirac's equation to calculate spin energy and develop a method for nearly degenerate systems. This work provides a foundation for understanding the fine structure of atomic energy levels and intercombinations between ortho- and para-states.
